page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MATTHEW
page.content: We can use the computer just for games but some discs have maths and problems which we have to solve. It's dinner time at twelve - school dinners are 65p a day, but I have a packed lunch which my Mum makes in the morning. After dinner we go out to play and today it's my turn to play tennis in the hall. We use plastic bats and a foam ball because it's inside. Back to the classroom and it's reading and project work for another hour and then we're off out into the sunshine for a game of rounders. It's a great game because you have to be sharp and fast. We go home exhausted and as soon as I get home I get changed from my school uniform and put jeans and my army jumper on.
